text.section:
If a licensee is placed on probation under § 1-502 or § 1-503 of this subtitle, the licensing authority may:
Require the licensee to submit to periodic drug testing during the period of probation;
Require the licensee to participate in appropriate counseling or treatment; and
Impose any other reasonable term or condition of probation.

If a licensee who is on probation violates any condition of probation, the licensing authority may:
Revoke the probation;
Suspend or revoke the licensee's license; or
Impose additional terms of probation.
